itunes:title: 22 For We'll All Be Sharing Our Dinner in Hell
title: 22 For We'll All Be Sharing Our Dinner in Hell
description:
Spartan men (and women) were encouraged from an early age to develop a very specific style of humor--short, punchy quips, often with a dark fatalistic bite. In today's episode we'll examine two examples, both true-historical and both from Thermopylae. Let's see if we can figure out why this style of humor perfectly fit warriors about to undergo a trial of death.

New episodes every Monday. SUBSCRIBE wherever you get your podcasts
